messages.message:
Hi Team,

It's informed that Scheduler App will be available for GA release by the end of Q3. Can we know what's the current status?

If it's ready, can we use it in JPMC environment which is on April release?
cc: @Nithin @Balaram @Ben

Generally when we say that something is GA ready by some time it means the latest release. we don’t backport non critical bug fixes to old release branches (you can see our release guidelines for details). For Q3 we shipped the 21.10.0 release so officially this is the release customers would have to take for any features promised in Q3. 
That being said, i’m not too familiar with specific work we did to GA scheduler. iirc some work was done in the July/August time frame. Would need Kerry to chime in on this.
